Uses of Package
uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees

Packages that use uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees
uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.indexing Provides the classes used for creating the data structures of the Terrier platform. 
uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees Provides basic binary tree implementations that are used during indexing of documents. 
 

Classes in uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees used by uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.indexing
DICOMFieldDocumentTreeNode
          This class represents a node in the DICOMFieldDocumentTree and contains the term.
FieldDocumentTreeNode
          The tree node used by the class FieldDocumentTree, when building the direct file with field information.
 

Classes in uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees used by uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees
BlockFieldDocumentTreeNode
          Models the tree node used when building the direct index with block and field information.
BlockLexiconTreeNode
          The tree node used when building a lexicon with block information.
BlockTree
          The binary tree used when creating the direct file with block information.
BlockTreeNode
          The binary tree node used by the BlockTree class.
ComparableDICOMFieldDocumentTreeNode
          This class implements the node of a comparable term in the document tree of comparable terms Used by the class ComparableDICOMFieldDocumentTree
DICOMFieldDocumentTree
          This class implements the binary tree containing the terms found in a document
DICOMFieldDocumentTreeNode
          This class represents a node in the DICOMFieldDocumentTree and contains the term.
FieldDocumentTree
          The binary tree used when we build the direct index with field information.
FieldDocumentTreeNode
          The tree node used by the class FieldDocumentTree, when building the direct file with field information.
LexiconTree
          This class represents the binary tree formed by the terms in the lexicon.
TagTreeNode
          This class represents a node in the binary tree representing the tag lexicon.
TermTreeNode
          This class represents a node in the binary tree of a query.
TreeNode
          This class represents a node in the binary tree representing either the lexicon, or a document.
